home.no_internet: No Internet Connection! Find a network to reconnect.
home.reboot_warning: Are you sure you want to reboot your router?
home.custom_lang_tips: Updates need to be downloaded from the Internet. English and Chinese are the official language packs, all other language packs are maintained by the community.
home.custom_lang_note: Unselected language packs will be deleted (except English).
